QuestData.Title: Captain Vimes
QuestData.Description: Captain Vimes should see the orc report you found, $n. He knows the orcish language better than most. And he should know that there are Horde spies near Theramore!$B$BThe captain is in the barracks, on the northeastern side of Theramore Isle.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Spy's Report to Captain Garran Vimes.
QuestData.RewardText: A report from an orc spy! How did you find this? No matter -- let's see what it says...
